'''Nicolaas Pieter Johannes ("Niklaas" or "Siener") Janse van Rensburg''' (August 30, 1862 - March 11, 1926) was a Boer from the South African Republic (aka: Transvaal Republic).

The name/title "Seiner" means "Seer".

He is similar to a South African Nostradamus, having made cryptic predictions based on his visions. During his service in the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Second_Boer_War Second Boer War], he began to experience these visions.  Some began to believe that he was prophetic.   His visions even garnered the attention of high-ranking government officials.

His predictions are very nationalist and inspired [https://edition.cnn.com/interactive/2018/11/africa/south-africa-suidlanders-intl/ Simon Roche] and [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suidlanders Suidlanders], interviewed by Alex in Ep. 104.

[https://heavenawaits.wordpress.com/siener-van-rensburg-visions-of-the-future/ Here you can find a list of his predictions, including those "fulfilled" and those which have not yet come to pass.]
